I need to be able to navigate between different researches, researchers and topics easily
I need to be able to quickly see the current status of a research
I need indications from researchers what to consider and how
I need to be able to browse all the research that has been done
I need to be able to follow each step taken in a research
I need to be able to search what has been done before
I need to be able to give precise feedback (a specific sentence / moment)
I need to be able to request access
I need a central portal where I can effectively communicate with all researchers
I need a concrete question in order to give good feedback
I need the research material to be edited in order to give good feedback
I need to be able to record my feedback as audio along video
I need to be able to find contact information
